description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的重要作家和文化人物，中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院副总理、中共中央宣传部部长、文化部部长、全国政协副主席等职，原副国级领导人。
description.en: An important writer and cultural figure of the Communist Party of China, a political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Premier of the State Council, Head of the CCP Central Propaganda Department, Minister of Culture, and Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee. He was a former deputy national leader.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海的大学，是交通大学的前身之一，陆定一于此毕业。
description.en: A university in Shanghai, one of the predecessors of Jiaotong University, from which Lu Dingyi graduated.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的青年组织，陆定一早年在此供职。
description.en: The youth wing of the Communist Party of China, where Lu Dingyi worked in his early years.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央宣传部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央宣传部
en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责意识形态、宣传和新闻的部门，陆定一曾长期担任部长。
description.en: The department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for ideology, propaganda, and media, where Lu Dingyi served as head for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的中国政治运动，期间陆定一受到严重迫害。
description.en: A political movement in China initiated and led by Mao Zedong, during which Lu Dingyi was severely persecuted.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关，陆定一曾任副总理。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China, where Lu Dingyi served as Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家、外交家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。陆定一曾是其下属，也在知识分子政策上与其意见相左。
description.en: Chinese statesman, military leader, and diplomat who served as the first Premier of the People's Republic of China. Lu Dingyi was his subordinate but also held opposing views on intellectual policy.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国文化部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国文化部
en: Ministry of Culture of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院下辖的部门，陆定一曾任部长。
description.en: A ministry under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, where Lu Dingyi once served as minister.

description.zh-cn: 陆定一的第一任妻子，革命烈士，在闽西游击战中牺牲。
description.en: Lu Dingyi's first wife, a revolutionary martyr who was killed during the guerrilla war in Western Fujian.

description.zh-cn: 陆定一的第二任妻子，曾长期向叶群等人写匿名信，引发政治风波。
description.en: Lu Dingyi's second wife, who wrote anonymous letters to Ye Qun and others over a long period, causing a political scandal.

description.zh-cn: 陆定一与唐义贞的女儿。
description.en: The daughter of Lu Dingyi and Tang Yizhen.

description.zh-cn: 陆定一与唐义贞的儿子。
description.en: The son of Lu Dingyi and Tang Yizhen.

description.zh-cn: 陆定一与严慰冰的长子，曾任中国防卫科技学院副院长。
description.en: The eldest son of Lu Dingyi and Yan Weibing, former vice president of China Institute of Defense Technology.

description.zh-cn: 陆定一与严慰冰的次子。
description.en: The second son of Lu Dingyi and Yan Weibing.

description.zh-cn: 陆定一与严慰冰的女儿。
description.en: The daughter of Lu Dingyi and Yan Weibing.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，中国共产党领导的八路军发动的对日军的大规模战役，陆定一参与了组织工作。
description.en: A large-scale offensive launched by the Eighth Route Army of the Communist Party of China against the Japanese army during the Second Sino-Japanese War, which Lu Dingyi helped to organize.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中华人民共和国的主要缔造者。陆定一曾与他一同转战陕北，并在知识分子问题上得到其支持，后在文化大革命中被其打倒。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary, politician, and theorist, the main founder of the People's Republic of China. Lu Dingyi retreated with him in northern Shaanxi, received his support on the issue of intellectuals, and was later purged by him during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，中共中央提出的旨在促进艺术和科学进步的方针。陆定一代表中共中央作了同名报告，是该运动的主要推动者之一。
description.en: A policy proposed by the Central Committee of the CCP after the founding of the PRC, aimed at promoting progress in the arts and sciences. Lu Dingyi delivered a report of the same name on behalf of the Central Committee and was one of the main promoters of the movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家、政治家，中华人民共和国十大元帅之一。在1962年广州会议上，他主张为知识分子脱帽，但遭到陆定一的明确反对。
description.en: Chinese military commander and politician, one of the Ten Marshals of the People's Republic of China. At the 1962 Guangzhou Conference, he advocated for removing the 'bourgeois' label from intellectuals, but was explicitly opposed by Lu Dingyi.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命前夕成立，负责领导文化宣传方面工作的机构，陆定一为副组长。后因《二月提纲》被《五一六通知》批判而解散。
description.en: An organization established on the eve of the Cultural Revolution to lead cultural and propaganda work, with Lu Dingyi as deputy leader. It was later dissolved after its 'February Outline' was criticized by the 'May 16 Notification'.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任文化革命五人小组组长，因《二月提纲》与陆定一等人一同被打倒。
description.en: Chinese politician, former leader of the Group of Five, who was purged along with Lu Dingyi and others over the 'February Outline'.

description.zh-cn: 由文化革命五人小组拟定，旨在将学术讨论限定在学术范围内，反对将学术问题政治化。该提纲后被《五一六通知》推翻。
description.en: A document drafted by the Group of Five, intended to confine academic discussions to the academic sphere and oppose the politicization of academic issues. It was later overturned by the 'May 16 Notification'.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局扩大会议通过的文件，批判了《二月提纲》，撤销了文化革命五人小组，标志着文化大革命的正式开始。
description.en: A document passed by an enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee, which criticized the 'February Outline', dissolved the Group of Five, and marked the official start of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家、政治家，中华人民共和国十大元帅之一。因其妻叶群收到陆定一之妻严慰冰的匿名信，而在政治上对陆定一进行打击报复。
description.en: Chinese military commander and politician, one of the Ten Marshals of the People's Republic of China. He retaliated politically against Lu Dingyi after his wife, Ye Qun, received anonymous letters from Lu's wife, Yan Weibing.

description.zh-cn: 林彪的妻子，曾长期收到严慰冰的匿名攻击信件。
description.en: Lin Biao's wife, who received anonymous, defamatory letters from Yan Weibing over a long period.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国主席。在1966年6月公开批判彭真、罗瑞卿、陆定一、杨尚昆，指控他们可能发动政变。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman of the People's Republic of China. In June 1966, he publicly criticized Peng Zhen, Luo Ruiqing, Lu Dingyi, and Yang Shangkun, accusing them of potentially staging a coup.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。该机构于1979年为陆定一平反。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China. This body rehabilitated Lu Dingyi in 1979.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织，陆定一曾任副主席。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, where Lu Dingyi served as Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中国改革开放的总设计师。曾任全国政协主席，是陆定一的上级。
description.en: Chinese politician, the chief architect of China's reform and opening-up. He served as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee and was Lu Dingyi's superior.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，周恩来的妻子。曾任全国政协主席，是陆定一的上级。
description.en: Chinese politician, wife of Zhou Enlai. She served as Chairwoman of the CPPCC National Committee and was Lu Dingyi's superior.

nodes.id: 江苏省海安双楼职业高级中学

zh-cn: 江苏省海安双楼职业高级中学

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一所农村职业中学，由陆定一倡导创办。
description.en: The first rural vocational high school in the People's Republic of China, founded under the advocacy of Lu Dingyi.

description.zh-cn: 陆定一1922年入上海南洋大学电机工程科学习并毕业。
description.en: Lu Dingyi entered the Electrical Engineering Department of Nanyang University in Shanghai in 1922 and graduated from there.

description.zh-cn: 陆定一于1925年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Lu Dingyi joined the Communist Party of China in 1925.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央宣传部

description.zh-cn: 陆定一长期担任中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: Lu Dingyi served as the Head of the CCP Central Propaganda Department for a long period.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 陆定一担任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Lu Dingyi served as Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国文化部

description.zh-cn: 陆定一兼任中华人民共和国文化部部长。
description.en: Lu Dingyi concurrently served as the Minister of Culture of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 陆定一在平反后当选为全国政协副主席。
description.en: After his rehabilitation, Lu Dingyi was elected Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

position.zh-cn: 国务院副总理、文化部部长

description.zh-cn: 在周恩来担任国务院总理期间，陆定一担任副总理及文化部部长，是其下属。
description.en: While Zhou Enlai was the Premier of the State Council, Lu Dingyi served as Vice Premier and Minister of Culture, making him a subordinate.

description.zh-cn: 唐义贞是陆定一的第一任妻子。
description.en: Tang Yizhen was Lu Dingyi's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 严慰冰是陆定一的第二任妻子。
description.en: Yan Weibing was Lu Dingyi's second wife.

description.zh-cn: 叶坪是陆定一的女儿。
description.en: Ye Ping is the daughter of Lu Dingyi.

description.zh-cn: 叶坪是唐义贞的女儿。
description.en: Ye Ping is the daughter of Tang Yizhen.

description.zh-cn: 范家定是陆定一的儿子。
description.en: Fan Jiading is the son of Lu Dingyi.

description.zh-cn: 范家定是唐义贞的儿子。
description.en: Fan Jiading is the son of Tang Yizhen.

description.zh-cn: 陆德是陆定一的儿子。
description.en: Lu De is the son of Lu Dingyi.

description.zh-cn: 陆德是严慰冰的儿子。
description.en: Lu De is the son of Yan Weibing.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，陆定一受到严重政治迫害，被撤销一切职务并被长期关押。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Lu Dingyi was severely politically persecuted, removed from all his posts, and imprisoned for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 陆定一参与组织了百团大战。
description.en: Lu Dingyi participated in organizing the Hundred Regiments Offensive.

description.zh-cn: 1956年5月，陆定一代表中共中央作了题为《百花齐放，百家争鸣》的报告，推动了该运动。
description.en: In May 1956, Lu Dingyi delivered a report titled 'Let a Hundred Flowers Bloom, Let a Hundred Schools of Thought Contend' on behalf of the CCP Central Committee, promoting the movement.

description.zh-cn: 在1962年的广州会议上，陆定一明确反对陈毅等人为知识分子脱去“资产阶级”帽子的提议。
description.en: At the Guangzhou Conference in 1962, Lu Dingyi explicitly opposed the proposal by Chen Yi and others to remove the 'bourgeois' label from intellectuals.

description.zh-cn: 在1962年广州会议上，毛泽东采纳了陆定一关于不应为知识分子摘掉“资产阶级知识分子”帽子的意见。
description.en: At the 1962 Guangzhou Conference, Mao Zedong adopted Lu Dingyi's opinion that the 'bourgeois intellectual' label should not be removed from intellectuals.

description.zh-cn: 陆定一担任文化革命五人小组的副组长。
description.en: Lu Dingyi served as the deputy leader of the Group of Five.

position.zh-cn: 文化革命五人小组副组长
position.en: Deputy Leader of the Group of Five

description.zh-cn: 在文化革命五人小组中，陆定一是副组长，组长为彭真。
description.en: In the Group of Five, Lu Dingyi was the deputy leader under the leader Peng Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 文化革命五人小组拟定并上报了《二月提纲》。
description.en: The Group of Five drafted and submitted the 'February Outline'.

description.zh-cn: 《五一六通知》批判并推翻了《二月提纲》。
description.en: The 'May 16 Notification' criticized and overturned the 'February Outline'.

description.zh-cn: 《五一六通知》的发布导致文化革命五人小组被撤销。
description.en: The issuance of the 'May 16 Notification' led to the dissolution of the Group of Five.

description.zh-cn: 作为《二月提纲》的主要负责人之一和文化革命五人小组的副组长，陆定一因《五一六通知》的发布而被打倒。
description.en: As one of the main persons in charge of the 'February Outline' and the deputy leader of the Group of Five, Lu Dingyi was purged following the issuance of the 'May 16 Notification'.

description.zh-cn: 《五一六通知》的发布标志着文化大革命的正式开始。
description.en: The issuance of the 'May 16 Notification' marked the official start of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在1960年至1966年间，严慰冰持续给叶群写匿名信，造谣其私生活，对其进行骚扰和攻击。
description.en: Between 1960 and 1966, Yan Weibing continuously sent anonymous letters to Ye Qun, spreading rumors about her private life, harassing and attacking her.

description.zh-cn: 因其妻子严慰冰写匿名信攻击叶群，林彪对陆定一进行政治报复，是导致陆定一被打倒的直接原因之一。
description.en: Due to his wife Yan Weibing's anonymous letters attacking Ye Qun, Lin Biao took political revenge on Lu Dingyi, which was one of the direct causes of Lu's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 1966年6月，刘少奇公开批判陆定一，指控其为反党集团成员，企图复辟资本主义。
description.en: In June 1966, Liu Shaoqi publicly criticized Lu Dingyi, accusing him of being a member of an anti-party clique attempting to restore capitalism.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 1979年6月8日，中共中央为陆定一平反，恢复其名誉和党籍。
description.en: On June 8, 1979, the CCP Central Committee rehabilitated Lu Dingyi, restoring his reputation and party membership.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平担任全国政协主席期间，陆定一是其副手。
description.en: While Deng Xiaoping served as Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, Lu Dingyi was his deputy.

position.en: Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 在邓颖超担任全国政协主席期间，陆定一是其副手。
description.en: While Deng Yingchao served as Chairwoman of the CPPCC National Committee, Lu Dingyi was her deputy.

relationships.target: 江苏省海安双楼职业高级中学

description.zh-cn: 1958年，陆定一倡导创办了中华人民共和国第一所农村职业中学——江苏省海安双楼职业高级中学。
description.en: In 1958, Lu Dingyi advocated for and founded the first rural vocational high school in the People's Republic of China, Jiangsu Haian Shuanglou Vocational High School.
